com.persistit

Class StreamSaver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.persistit.Task
      • com.persistit.StreamSaver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class StreamSaver
extends Task

    Saves Persistit records to a DataOutputStream in the format expected by a StreamLoader instance.

    Version:
    1.0

      • StreamSaver

        public StreamSaver(Persistit persistit,
           DataOutputStream dos)
        Construct a StreamSaver from the provided DataOutputStream. The DataOutputStream should be based on a BufferedOutputStream for better performance.
        Parameters:
        dos - The DataOutputStream

    • Method Detail

      • getCycleCount

        public int getCycleCount()
        Returns the cycle count, which is the maximum number of records that will be written with elided keys. When this number of records is reached, StreamSaver writes the next record with a full, unelided key value. This permits easier visual inspection of the save file.
        Returns:
        The cycle count

      • setCycleCount

        public void setCycleCount(int count)
        Sets the cycle count. See getCycleCount() for a description of this property.
        Parameters:
        count - The cycle count

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException
        Closes this StreamSaver and the underlying DataOutputStream. If the save operation ran to completion without error, this method writes a COMPLETION record to the save file before closing it. This record indicates that the save file represents all the records requested by the save operation.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • writeData

        protected void writeData(Exchange exchange)
                  throws IOException
        Writes the key/value pair represented by the current state of an Exchange into a DATA record. If the supplied Exchange is based on different volume or tree than the previously written record, this method also writes VOLUME_ID and/or TREE_ID records before the DATA record. This allows the StreamLoader to apply the data record to the correct volume and tree.
        Parameters:
        exchange - The Exchange
        Throws:
        IOException

      • writeData

        protected void writeData(Key key,
             Value value)
                  throws IOException
        Writes a key/value pair into a DATA record.
        Parameters:
        key - The Key
        value - The Value
        Throws:
        IOException

      • writeRecordCount

        protected void writeRecordCount(long dataRecordCount,
                    long otherRecordCount)
                         throws IOException
        Writes a RECORD_COUNT record. This record conveys the counts of data records and non-data records written to the stream so far, and can be used to check the integrity of the save file. The RECORD_COUNT record is preceded by three FILL records to allow for easier inspection of the save file.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • writeVolumeInfo

        protected void writeVolumeInfo(Exchange exchange)
                        throws IOException
        Writes a VOLUME_ID record for the Volume currently associated with the supplied Exchange. The information is sufficient to recreate a new, empty Volume having the same path name, original size and growth parameters as the Volume being saved.
        Parameters:
        exchange - The Exchange
        Throws:
        IOException

      • writeTreeInfo

        protected void writeTreeInfo(Exchange exchange)
                      throws IOException
        Writes a TREE_ID record for the Tree currently associated with the supplied Exchange. The information is sufficient to recreate a new, empty Tree having the same name as the Tree being saved.
        Parameters:
        exchange -
        Throws:
        IOException

      • writeVolumeInfo

        protected void writeVolumeInfo(Volume volume)
                        throws IOException
        Writes a VOLUME_ID record for the supplied Volume. The saved information is sufficient to recreate a new, empty Volume having the same path name, original size and growth parameters as the Volume being saved.
        Parameters:
        volume - The Volume
        Throws:
        IOException

      • writeTreeInfo

        protected void writeTreeInfo(Tree tree)
                      throws IOException
        Writes a TREE_ID record for the supplied Tree. The saved information is sufficient to recreate a new, empty Tree having the same name as the Tree being saved.
        Parameters:
        tree - The Tree
        Throws:
        IOException

      • writeTimestamp

        protected void writeTimestamp()
                       throws IOException
        Writes a TIMESTAMP record containing the current system time.

                       throws IOException

        Parameters:

        Throws:
        IOException

      • save

        public void save(Exchange exchange,
        KeyFilter filter)
          throws PersistitException,
                 IOException
        Save all key/value pairs in the Tree associated with the supplied Exchange, subject to selection by the supplied KeyFilter. If the filter is null then save all records.
        Parameters:
        exchange - The Exchange
        filter - The KeyFilter
        Throws:
        PersistitException
        IOException

      • saveTrees

        public void saveTrees(String volumeName,
             String[] selectedTreeNames)
               throws PersistitException,
                      IOException
        Saves one or more trees in a named volume. The volume is specified by volumeName, which may either be the full path name of an open volume, or a substring that uniquely matches one open volume.
        Parameters:
        volumeName - The volume name, or a substring that matches only one volume.
        selectedTreeNames - An array names of the trees to be saved.
        Throws:
        PersistitException
        IOException

      • saveTrees

        public void saveTrees(Volume volume,
             String[] selectedTreeNames)
               throws PersistitException,
                      IOException
        Saves one or more trees in the specified Volume.
        Parameters:
        volume - The Volume
        selectedTreeNames - An array names of the trees to be saved.
        Throws:
        PersistitException
        IOException

      • saveTrees

        public void saveTrees(TreeSelector treeSelector)
               throws PersistitException,
                      IOException
        Saves one or more trees.
        Parameters:
        treeSelector - The TreeSelectors to select volumes, trees, and KeyFilters within trees.
        Throws:
        PersistitException
        IOException

        public void saveAll()
             throws PersistitException,
                    IOException
        Save all trees in all open volumes.
        Throws:
